ygData.subject: The Vile Force Arrives and strikes.
ygData.msgSnippet: As the X-Predacon ship, the Violator exits the portal high in the sky above the Trainers base, inside the the ship Vile looks to various scanners and visuals

Subject: The Vile Force Arrives and strikes.
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="part1_a1.16405d6a.284add17_boundary"
X-Mailer: AOL 6.0 for Windows US sub 10519
From: Legendarynemasis@...


--part1_a1.16405d6a.284add17_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

As the X-Predacon ship, the Violator exits the portal high in the sky above 
the Trainers base, inside the the ship Vile looks to various scanners and 
visuals of the base being fired on. 

Vile: "It seems these people are attacking  a base which seems to not be 
fairing well... Let us even the odds shall we? Then we will recruit the 
people of this base as a payment."

Vile laughs evily before he opens a com to Cyanide.

Vile: "Cyanide, unleash the fury of acid onto everyone outside this ship and 
that base. We shall back you up. Let not one bot invade that base!"

Elsewhere in the ship Cyanide smirks as he recieves Viles comm and 
immediately runs off. A short time later a portion of the ship opens and its 
shields deactivate before Cyanide flys out of the ship and the shields range, 
the shields reactivating shortly after he poasses through them. The 
Transmetal two fuzor cackles evil as he looks to the Destructocons.

Cyanide; "You three run around like your chickens with your heads cut off... 
Let me really give you something to run from!"

With that said Cyanide begins to concentrate and his body begins to crackle 
with green energy, green lightning seems to cross from his outstretched hands 
as above everyone large clouds form over the trainers base and around it. 
Soon afterwards acid rain begins to fall of the highest acidity.

Cyanide: "Yes fools, this is the beggining of the end for you all! We shall 
not fail our mission!"

Back on the bridge of the Violator, Vile nods to Methos and Gemini 2 as they 
bring the ships weapons online. Along the sides of the ship two panels on 
each side open up and two large laser cannons pop out. On the bridge Skywarp 
looks at a visual and then his scanner seeing the large amount of Holographic 
images from Halucigen, however the scanner picked up none of them. Signaling 
out the real one he locked onto the true Halucigen with one of the laser 
cannons before it fired, the other three each sending a beam at Skywarp, 
Dirge, and Ramjet. Meanwhile Methos locked onto the approaching Cygnar and 
Killfest and opened fire on each with a blast from the ships two megacannons. 
 On the front of the ship six holes open up before they begin to glow with 
energy as proton torpedoes are loaded iknto the ships shafts readying to fire.


--part1_a1.16405d6a.284add17_boundary
